amendment.description: To restore funding for the Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 156 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 65.

action.text: Amendment SA 156 proposed by Senator Sarbanes. (consideration: CR S2886-2894, S2923-2924; text: CR S2887) To restore funding for the Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) program.
